title: The Warrior Prophet
description: Mia Crawford is a prophet. She can see angels. She also sees demons. Everywhere. The angels are preparing for war to get her fallen angel boyfriend, Michael, back. A war that could take years. Haunted by visions of Michael's soul being tortured, Mia can't rest until she knows he's safe. To save him, she must make an impossible journey through Hell with the one person she prayed she'd never see again.
author: Lisa Voisin
